nodes.id: Bill that could ban TikTok in the US passed. Here's what to know
White House urges Senate to 'move swiftly' on TikTok bill as lawmakers drag their heels
Content creators blast a potential TikTok ban
US Lawmakers See TikTok as China’s Tool, Even as It Distances Itself From Beijing
Trump calls TikTok a threat but says some kids could 'go crazy' without it
President Biden supports bill that could make TikTok unavailable in the U.S.
